name: Mammoth Media
overview:
Mammoth Media is a nimble, one-man web design & internet marketing juggernaut based in the Piedmont Triad area of North Carolina.

Mammoth Media has been building and optimizing websites for over a decade now and quite simply – we know what works. A robust website is created when aesthetics and code combine to persuade consumers and entice search engines. Having one without the other will cost you money and time.

Mammoth Media’s Search Engine Marketing services drive more potential customers to your website. As consumer behavior continues to shift to a predominantly digital research process, it is essential that your website can be found easily. Your rank within search results directly effects revenue. Our services make sure you’re well positioned to increase return on investment.

Mammoth Media will help you create and manage social profiles on all the relevant networks. But we go far beyond that – we’ll be there to monitor how your social community is responding and help you adjust your message accordingly.
